Author: Markus#5464
Content:
I can see someone building a smart contract that claim rewards, that would be cool. It would work like this:
1. You deposit your KMD to the contract along with a payout address (if you wish to get claimed kmd payout you can choose to do so or add it to your balance in the contract)
2. The contract return you a secret key that you can use to request a payout of your kmd balance from the contract.
